titleStmt.title: An abridgement of the notable woorke of Polidore Vergile conteignyng the deuisers and firste finders out as well of artes, ministeries, feactes & ciuill ordinaunces, as of rites, and ceremonies, commo[n]ly vsed in the churche: and the originall beginnyng of the same. Co[m]pendiously gathered by Thomas Langley
De rerum inventoribus. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Vergil, Polydore, 1470?-1555.

titleStmt.title: An abridgement of the notable woorke of Polidore Vergile conteignyng the deuisers and firste finders out as well of artes, ministeries, feactes & ciuill ordinaunces, as of rites, and ceremonies, commo[n]ly vsed in the churche: and the originall beginnyng of the same. Co[m]pendiously gathered by Thomas Langley
De rerum inventoribus. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Vergil, Polydore, 1470?-1555.
Langley, Thomas, d. 1581. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: VVithin the precincte of the late dissolued house of the Grey Friars, by Richard Grafton printer to the princes grace,
publicationStmt.date: the. xvi daie of Aprill, the yere of our lorde M.D.xlvi. [1546]

notesStmt.note: A translation and abridgment of: Vergil, Polydore. De inventoribus rerum.
At bottom of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Some print show-through; some leaves marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
